message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500.  It's a great deal, and I know it's worth more to you.  Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate you being flexible.  I'm really interested in the product but I can only go up to $10,500 right now. Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $10,500 is a good offer, I'm aiming for a bit closer to my original asking price.  Would you be willing to go up to $11,000?  That would make it a fair deal for both of us.
